key.name: are_you_sure_to_cancel
key.value: Are you sure to cancel the import?

key.name: csv_uploader_desc
key.value: This form lets you import CSV (comma separated value) user profile data to your site. You need to have .csv file (or .zip archive of that file) extracted from your old database.

key.name: double_select
key.value: You already used same question for: {$questions}

key.name: fake_email_desc
key.value: The email will be assigned for all fake profiles in this terms email+profile-id@mail.com. For exam: if you set mike@gmail.com it will be assigned as mike+198@gmail.com. Where 198 is ID of fake profile

key.name: import_note
key.value:
Attention: profile questions with predefined values (single & multiple choice) have the limit of 31 values.

If any profile question contains more values, the system will only select 31 top used ones. Other values will be set empty in profiles.

key.name: only_one_process_run
key.value: Only the one import process can be run simultaneously. Wait until the current imported will be finished or you may cancel it at any time

key.name: processing_import_desc
key.value:
Importing profiles from CSV data. It make take a while...
Make sure Cron is set on your server

key.name: processing_process_desc
key.value:
Processing CSV file (it may take a while)...
Make sure Cron is set on your server

key.name: send_welcome_message_desc
key.value: A welcome email will be sent to each imported profile.

key.name: upload_error_cant_write
key.value: Failed to write file to disk

key.name: upload_error_extension
key.value: A PHP extension stopped the file upload. PHP does not provide a way to ascertain which extension caused the file upload to stop; examining the list of loaded extensions with phpinfo() may help

key.name: upload_error_form_size
key.value: The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE directive that was specified in the HTML form

key.name: upload_error_ini_size
key.value: The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini

key.name: upload_error_partial
key.value: The uploaded file was only partially uploaded

key.name: upload_type_error
key.value: You can only upload *.csv and *.zip files

key.name: wait_one_minute
key.value: Please, wait one minute to make new import!

key.name: you_already_have_import
key.value: You already have active import in process. If you proceed, it will be canceled.

key.name: you_need_to_upload
key.value: You need to upload ZIP with photos and CSV into the folder above and refresh page with DEV_MODE. Both files should be name the same (for exam: worldwide100k.zip and worldwide100k.csv)
